content.description: Started on a crimp and ended on the nice round grab at the top. Easy to come down around the side. This rock is a great overhang with a lot of different problems. This was probably the easiest route on it. There is probably 4 or 5 more on this one overhang. My one issue with it is the rocks underneath make it hard to have some even mat placement. Other than that it is a really great spot and I hope other people check it out.
content.location: It is to the left on the trail in the first clearing of the trees up the hill. There is a small patch of pines, it is just beyond that.

content.description: I would climb this with a rope but its a really great rock with a slight angle. Lots of different routes on it. Pretty short though. Lots of others like this in the area
content.protection: Could make anchors with trees up top.
content.location: Just follow the trail and it will be on your left by the old field.

content.description: This area has a lot of really great climbs and has a lot of potential to be developed. They're really great and the whole area has so much to offer. The rock is quite brittle so just check your holds before you hang on them.
